sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import Navigation from '../components/Navigation' import { signup } from '../core/apiCore' import logo from '../Recursos/SVG/jujunegro.svg' function Signup() { const [values, setValues] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', error: '', success: false }) const { name, email, password, error, success } = values const handleChange = name => event => { setValues({ ...values, error: false, [name]: event.target.values }) } const clickSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() setValues({ ...values, error: false }) signup({ name, email, password }).then(data => { if (data.error) { setValues({ ...values, error: data.error, success: false }) } else { setValues({ ...values, name: '', email: '', password: '', error: '', success: true }) } }) } const signupForm = () => (
Olvidaste tu contraseña?
) return ( <>
Crear una Cuenta
{signupForm()} {/*
Olvidaste tu contraseña?
*/}
{/*

Iniciar Sesión

uodhrlgvuhdf;
*/}
) } export default Signup
